name: AUP at Login
short_description:
This application was developed for the intent of displaying an AUP at the time of login via GPO. It displays the AUP.txt file that is created by the sysadmin and gives the user the ability to accept or decline the AUP. Upon accepting the program closes, upon declining the user is automatically logged off. The user is given 60 seconds to make a decision. If the timer runs out, a message is displayed and the user is logged off. A log file is appended each time the application runs. This gathers the User ID, Date/Time and an Accept/Decline/Time out message.

You will need the three files AUP.exe, AUP.txt, and AUPLog.txt files for the program to function. All files must be located within the same directory, unless otherwise edited in the source code.
summary: Displays AUP when executed, Logs user off if not accepted
